actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 to make privately owned public use airports eligible for assistance under the Act.

summary.text: Amends the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 to make privately owned public use airports eligible for Federal financial assistance under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 to make privately owned public use airports eligible for assistance under the Act.
